column2: "Ɔsor
column3: hom nyɛ aso
column4: na merebɛkasa; Na wɔmma asaase ntsie m’anomu nsɛm:"

column2: "Me nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔsosɔ dɛ nyankom
column3: Me kasaa bogugu dɛ ɔbɔsu; Dɛ nkyɛkyɛr do nsumpetsema
column4: Nye haban do nsutɔree:"

column2: "Na mobɔbɔ EWURADZE dzin akyerɛ: Hom mfa kɛseyɛ mma hɛn Nyankopɔn
column4: "Ɔbotan no
column5: n’edwuma dzi mu; Na n’akwan nyinara yɛ atsɛmbu: Nyankopɔn nokwardzifo a

column2: "Woedzi no asɛmbɔn
column3: wɔnnyɛ ne mba
column4: hɔn dzɛmdzi a; Ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkye a wɔakyea a."

column2: "Ana EWURADZE na hom nye no dzi no dɛm yi
column3: Ɔman nkwasea a wɔnnyɛ enyansafo? Ana nnyɛ ɔno nye w’egya a ɔawo wo bi a? Ɔno na ɔayɛ wo na oetsintsim wo."

column2: "Kaa tsetsentserdee nda no
column3: Dwen ebusuasantsen pii no hɔn mfe ho: Bisa w’egya
column4: na ɔnkyerɛ wo; Wo mpanyimfo

column2: "Aber a Ɔsorsornyi no memaa amanaman hɔn egyapadze no
column3: Aber a ɔpaapaa nyimpa mba mu no
column4: Osisii aman hɔn ahe Dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba hɔn dodow tse."

column2: "Na EWURADZE ne kyɛfa nye ne man; Jakob nye n’egyapadze kyɛfa."
"Ohun no wɔ sar asaase do
column3: Na kwaa tuntum sar predede do nkekabowa mu; Otwaa no ho hyiae
column4: ɔhwɛɛ no do yie
column5: Ɔkoraa no do dɛ n’enyiwa kyesua:"

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ɔkɔr huenyan ne birebuw
column3: Na otu bɔ ne ba do faafaa no
column4: Ɔtserɛɛw ne ntsaban mu faa hɔn no
column5: Ɔsoaa hɔn wɔ ne ntɛkyerɛ do:"

column2: "EWURADZE nkotoo na ogyaa no Na onyame fofor bi annka no ho
column4: "Ɔmaa ɔfaa asaase mbea sorɔnsorɔm do tutui kɔree
column5: Na odzii haban mu ndɔbaa; Na ɔmaa ohwieew ewo fii ɔbotan mu
column6: Nye ngo fii ɔtwerɛbo botan mu;"

column2: "Anantwi numfonsungo
column3: nye nguan numfonsu
column4: Nye nguambaa seradze
column7: Nye ewifua ntan mu seradze; Na enoom esikyireamba mu bɔgya wenyin."

column2: "Na Jesurun  yɛɛ ɔbran
column3: na ɔtoow ntsia: Ayɛ bran
column4: ayɛ kɛse
column5: wo mu ayɛ dur: Nna ɔpoow Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛɛ no no
column6: Na obuu no nkwagye botan no tootooba."
column7: "#32.15 JESURUN: Dzin yi gyina hɔ ma Israel."

column2: "Wɔdze enyame nanaben yii no nyinkun
column3: Wɔdze ekyiwadze yii no ebufuw."

column2: "Wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa abosom a wɔnnyɛ Nyame
column3: Dze maa enyame a wonnyim hɔn
column4: Dze maa enyame fofor a wɔbaa nkyinkyirii
column5: Dza hom egyanom ennsuro hɔn no."

column2: "Ɔbotan a ɔwoo wo no anndwen no ho
column3: Na wo werɛ efir Nyame a ɔkyeem wo no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hunii
column3: na okyiir hɔn
column4: Wɔ ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa ho ehi ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mibeyi m’enyim esuma hɔn
column4: Mobɔhwɛ mbrɛ hɔn ewiei bɛyɛ: Na wɔyɛ ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkye
column5: Mba a hɔn mu nnyi gyedzi."

column2: "Wɔdze dza ɔnnyɛ Onyame eyi me nyinkun: Wɔdze hɔn egyangyandze eyi me ebufuw: Na medze hɔn a wɔnnyɛ ɔman biara no mibeyi hɔn nyinkun; Medze ɔman nkwasea bi mibeyi hɔn ebufuw."
"Na ogya adzɛw wɔ m’ebufuw mu
column3: Na ɔrehyew ekodu samanadze ase
column4: Na ɔremen asaase nye no ndɔbaa
column5: Na ɔato mbepɔw mfapem mu ogya."

column2: "Mobɔboa mbusu ano megu hɔn do; Mobɔhwer m’egyen menaba wɔ hɔn do:"
"Ɔkɔm bɔfɔn hɔn
column3: na ahohyehye yaayaw Nye ɔsɛɛ wenwen bɛmen hɔn; Na mobɔsoma mbowa se ma wɔaaba hɔn do
column4: Nye huntuma mu nweaweambowa bɔr."

column2: "Abɔntsen do na nkrantsee bohwim
column3: Adankyir so nketsenketse a; Ɔbɛsɛɛ aberantsɛ nye ɔbaabun nyina
column4: Enumfoanoba nye nyimpa a oefuw gon nyina."

column2: "Mesee dɛ nkyɛ mobɔbɔ hɔn apetse ekyirekyir
column3: Nkyɛ mebɛma hɔn nkaa tun do etwa efi nyimpa mu:"

column2: "Sɛ nnyɛ ɔtamfo ehiyi na musuroi a
column3: Bɛyɛ na hɔn ayɛfo anntse m’akwan ase
column4: Bɛyɛ na wɔase dɛ
column6: Na nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔayɛ iyi nyinara."

column2: "Na wɔyɛ aman a egyinatu abɔ hɔn
column3: Na ntseasee bi nnyi hɔn mu."

column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ woeehu nyansa
column3: na wɔaatse iyi ase
column4: Na nkyɛ wɔaadwen hɔn ewiei ekyir no ho!"

column2: "Ɔbaako bɛyɛ dɛn etsiw apem
column3: Na beenu aka mpemdu egu
column4: Gyedɛ hɔn Ɔbotan atɔn hɔn ana
column5: Na EWURADZE eyi hɔn ama ana?"

column2: "Na hɔn ɔbotan nntse dɛ hɛn Ɔbotan
column3: Na hɛn atamfo ankasa mpo nye atsɛmbuafo."

column2: "Na hɔn wenyindua fi Sodom wenyindua mu
column3: Na ofi Gomora haban mu: Hɔn esikyireamba yɛ bɔr esikyireamba
column4: Hɔn esiaw yɛ wenwen:"

column2: "Hɔn nsa yɛ sasabɔnsam bɔr
column3: Nye nhurutsia owubɔr dzendzen."

column2: "Ana wɔnnkora iyi do wɔ me nkyɛn
column3: Wɔnnsɔw ano wɔ m’akoradze mu bi a?"

column2: "Awerdzi yɛ medze
column3: akatua so
column4: Aber a hɔn anan bɛpatser: Na hɔn mbusu da abɛn
column5: Na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ dɛ ɔba hɔn do no bɛba ntsɛntsɛm."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bobu ne man atsɛn
column3: Na oenu noho wɔ no nkowaa ntsi; Aber a obohu dɛ hɔn ahoɔdzen asa
column4: Na ɔdehye anaa akowaa biara nnyi hɔ bio
column7: Henfa na hɔn enyame no wɔ
column8: Ɔbotan a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛɛ mu no;"

column2: "Hɔn a wodzi hɔn okum afɔr seradze
column3: Na wɔnom hɔn ɔnom afɔr nsa no a? Ma wɔnsoɛr mbɔboa hom
column4: Ma wɔnyɛ hom ntwitwagye."

column2: "Afei hom nhu dɛ emi
column3: mara nye no
column4: Na onyame bi nnka mo ho: Emi na muku
column6: na mesa yarba: Na obi nnyi hɔ a obotum agye efi me nsamu."

column2: "Na mema me nsa do wɔ ɔsor
column3: Na mese dɛ
column4: Dɛ metse ase daa yi
column7: Na me nsa suo atsɛmbu mu a; Mibedzi hɔn a wɔnye me dzi esi do wer
column8: Na metua hɔn a wɔtan me kaw."

column2: "Mebɛma bɔgya abow m’egyen menaba
column3: Na me nkrantsee edzi nam; Atɔfo nye ndɔmmumfo bɔgyaa
column4: Ofi ɔtamfo Edzikamfo tsir do."

column2: "Amanaman
column3: hom nye ne man ndzi dɛw: Na obedzi no nkowaa bɔgyaa ho wer
column4: Na ɔdze awerdzi etua n’ayɛfo kaw
column5: Na ɔapata ama n’asaase ama ne man."

column2: "Na Moses baa bɛkaa ndwom yi mu nsɛm nyinara wɔ ɔman no asomu
column3: ɔno
column4: nye Nun ne babanyin Josua."

column2: "Na Moses wiee nsɛm yi nyinara ka kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara:"
"na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mfa hom akoma nsi nsɛm a miridzi hom ho dase ndɛ da yi nyinara do; ɔno na hom mfa nhyɛ hom mba
column4: dɛ wɔndwen do ndzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do."

column2: "Na mma ɔnnyɛ asɛnhun mma hom; osiandɛ ɔyɛ hom nkwa
column3: na asɛm yi do na hom nam bɛma hom nda awar wɔ asaase a hom rukotwa Jordan akɛfa no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses da no ara dɛ
column4: "Kɔfow bepɔw Abarim yi
column5: kɔ bepɔw Nebo a ɔwɔ Moab asaase do
column6: wɔ Jeriko tsentsendo no; na hwɛ Keenan asaase a medze merema Israelmba dɛ enyadze no:"

column2: "na wu wɔ bepɔw no a erofow akɔ do no do
column3: na kɛka wo nananom ho wɔ samanadze; dɛ mbrɛ wo nua Aaron wui wɔ bepɔw Horeb do
column4: na ɔkɛkaa ne nananom ho no;"

column2: "osiandɛ hom foom me wɔ Israelmba mu wɔ Meriba nsu a ɔwɔ Kades
column3: wɔ Zin sar do no ho; osiandɛ hom annyɛ me krɔnkrɔn wɔ Israelmba mu."

column2: "Na ibohu asaase no wɔ w’enyim; na mbom eronnkɔ asaase a medze rema Israelmba no do hɔ."
